channel.title: PHPTAL - Template Attribute Language for PHP
channel.description: PHPTAL Is the PHP Implementation of TAL/TALES/METAL/I18N

item.title: PHPTAL 1.0.1
item.description: This release includes PHPTAL_Filter and PHPTAL_Trigger interfaces.
item.dc:creator: Laurent Bedubourg

item.title: PHPTAL 1.0.2
item.description: - fixed xml declaration with doctype clash - added support for XMLNS aliases
item.dc:creator: Laurent Bedubourg
